fields.name: endpointSpanCountPercentileThreshold
fields.description: It specifies that the PX value (percentile value like P95) for the span count within the training data samples should be greater than 0. For example, if the value = 0.25, that means the P25(training data samples) > 0 or we should have at least 75% legitimate training data points.

fields.name: endpointSpanCountThreshold
fields.description: It specifies that we should have seen these many spans for the endpoint within the training window at least once

fields.name: timeFractionTrainingWindowThreshold
fields.description: It specifies what the maximum permissible time duration between the first and last time sorted data points should be as a fraction of the training data window.

fields.name: trainingScopeConfig
fields.description: The training config would be applied on the endpoints identified by this config

fields.name: detectionScopeConfig
fields.description: The detection config would be applied on the endpoints identified by this config

fields.name: endpointSpanCountDetectionThreshold
fields.description: Minimum span count for the API to be present during the detection run for the API data to be qualified to be run through the detector
